QuestData.Title: Iron Them Out
QuestData.Description:
The orcs themselves are not the only threat. They still have siege weapons of significant power.
They've already been used against Tuurem, and we must not allow for their continued operation.
Sabotage siege weapons using the explosives you collected from the logging camp.
QuestData.CompletionText: I fear that Maraad might be losing the light... if he has not already lost it.
QuestData.RewardText: They will be unable to use those weapons against us when we attack Tuurem.
